title: Registration Opening
description: This is where you submit to the hall of fame. Get a team of capable members who are well-versed with Bash or any other scripting language so that you are one step closer to victory.

title: Awareness Session + Practise Round
description: Learn rules of the bashaway and navigate through the competition platforms. Join the practise round to sharpen your swords for the real battle.

title: Registration Closing
description: No registrations will be accepted after this date.

title: Practical Workshop
description: Enhance your skills with industry experts at IFS and master essential concepts to excel in Bashaway. Get hands-on experience with the cutting-edge tech.

title: 1st Round
description: The real battle begins today! Showcase your scripting skills and secure a spot in the next round.

title: Final Round
description: The sun rises over an intense battleground marking the begining of Bashaway 2024's most challenging round.

title: Award Ceremony
description: Winners will be crowned, legends will be carved on stone, as Bashaway 2024 comes to a triumphant close.
